title: Molecular Microbiology
description: Molecular genetics of bacteria with an emphasis on experimental approaches, regulatory mechanisms on disease-causing and environmental bacteria, and biotechnology applications derived from microbes.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (BIOL 1510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 1511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or (BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or (BIOS 1207 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1207L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D))
